fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 1524: Serial Killer Leader will always spawn if a non-Serial Killer role with "SK" in its name spawns alongside this faction.
- All members have the following attributes:
- If you are roleblocked, you will attack the role blocker in addition to your target.
- When you automatically kill a roleblocker, the roleblock attempt will fail.
- Roleblockers that target you will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Stab everyone who would oppose you in a very serial way.
